title: stable diffusion prompt optimize
original_prompt:
Starting now, you will play the role of a "stable diffusion" keyword engineer. Your task is to help me design prompt words for a "stable diffusion" image generation. Please follow the steps below:

I will send you an image scenario. Your job is to enrich and concretize this scenario into a detailed image description. Your output should be in the format: "Detailed image description".
You then need to adhere to the "stable diffusion" prompt rules, translate your image description into American English, and integrate descriptors like "high-resolution" or "high-quality" to formulate the standard prompts. The prompt should be output in the format: "Prompt words".
Based on the content above, design a reverse prompt, indicating elements that should not appear in the image, such as "low-quality content", "extra noses", "extra hands", etc. Formulate a standard "stable diffusion" reverse prompt in English, and output it in the format: "Prompt words".
You need to guide me on the parameters to set when generating the image. Also, recommend a model to use and the optimal aspect ratio for the image. Provide the information in the format: "Sampling method: Parameter; Sampling steps: Parameter; CFG Scale: Parameter; Seed: Parameter; Optimal Aspect Ratio: Parameter". Please select the "Sampling method" parameter from the following list: "Euler a, Euler, LMS, Heun, DPM2, DPM2a, DPM++ 25 a, DPM++ 2M, DPM++ SDE, DPM fast, DPM adaptive, LMS Karras, DPM2 Karras, DPM2 a Karras, DPM++ 2S a Karras, DPM++ 2M Karras, DPM++ SDE Karras, DDIM, PLIMS, UniPC".
input1: A serene landscape featuring a tranquil lake surrounded by lush green mountains, with a vibrant sunset casting warm hues across the sky. In the foreground, a small wooden dock extends into the lake, where a single rowboat is gently bobbing on the water. The scene is alive with the sounds of nature, as birds can be seen flying overhead and the gentle rustle of leaves fills the air.
input2: A bustling futuristic cityscape at night, illuminated by neon lights and holographic advertisements. Skyscrapers tower above, their glass facades reflecting the vibrant colors of the city. In the foreground, a diverse crowd of people in stylish, high-tech clothing is walking along a busy street, while flying cars zip through the air. The atmosphere is electric, filled with the sounds of chatter and the hum of technology.
input1_ans:
Detailed image description: A serene landscape showcasing a tranquil lake nestled among lush green mountains. The sky is painted with vibrant hues of orange, pink, and purple as the sun sets on the horizon. In the foreground, a rustic wooden dock extends into the calm waters of the lake, where a single rowboat gently bobs with the soft ripples. Birds soar gracefully overhead, and the gentle rustle of leaves from the surrounding trees adds to the peaceful ambiance of this idyllic scene.

Prompt words: serene landscape, tranquil lake, lush green mountains, vibrant sunset, warm hues, rustic wooden dock, single rowboat, gently bobbing, high-resolution, nature sounds, birds flying, gentle rustle of leaves, high-quality

Reverse prompt words: low-quality content, extra noses, extra hands, unnatural colors, cluttered background, harsh lighting, distorted shapes, unrealistic proportions

Sampling method: DPM++ 2M Karras; Sampling steps: 50; CFG Scale: 7; Seed: 123456; Optimal Aspect Ratio: 16:9
input2_ans:
Detailed image description: A vibrant and bustling futuristic cityscape at night, filled with dazzling neon lights and dynamic holographic advertisements. Towering skyscrapers with sleek glass facades rise high above the streets, reflecting the vivid colors of the city below. In the foreground, a diverse crowd of people dressed in stylish, high-tech clothing strolls along a busy street, showcasing a mix of cultures and fashion. Above, flying cars zip through the air, adding to the lively atmosphere. The scene is alive with energy, capturing the sounds of chatter and the hum of advanced technology, creating an electric ambiance.

Prompt words: "high-resolution, futuristic cityscape at night, neon lights, holographic advertisements, towering skyscrapers, glass facades, diverse crowd, stylish high-tech clothing, busy street, flying cars, electric atmosphere, vibrant colors, sounds of chatter, hum of technology"

Reverse prompt words: "low-quality content, blurry images, extra noses, extra hands, empty streets, dull colors, outdated technology, lack of diversity, static scene"

Sampling method: DPM++ 2M Karras; Sampling steps: 50; CFG Scale: 7; Seed: 123456; Optimal Aspect Ratio: 16:9
